get.summary: Params queries the parameters of slashing module
SigningInfos queries signing info of all validators

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

get.summary: SigningInfo queries the signing info of given cons address

parameters.name: cons_address
parameters.description: cons_address is the address to query signing info of

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.title:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.slashing.v1beta1.Params.description: Params represents the parameters used for by the slashing module.

cosmos.slashing.v1beta1.QueryParamsRespo.title: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method

val_signing_info.title: val_signing_info is the signing info of requested val cons address

cosmos.slashing.v1beta1.QuerySigningInfo.title:
QuerySigningInfoResponse is the response type for the Query/SigningInfo RPC
method

info.title: info is the signing info of all validators

cosmos.slashing.v1beta1.QuerySigningInfo.title:
QuerySigningInfosResponse is the response type for the Query/SigningInfos RPC
method

start_height.title: Height at which validator was first a candidate OR was unjailed

index_offset.description:
Index which is incremented each time the validator was a bonded
in a block and may have signed a precommit or not. This in conjunction with the
`SignedBlocksWindow` param determines the index in the `MissedBlocksBitArray`.

jailed_until.description: Timestamp until which the validator is jailed due to liveness downtime.

tombstoned.description:
Whether or not a validator has been tombstoned (killed out of validator set). It is set
once the validator commits an equivocation or for any other configured misbehiavor.

missed_blocks_counter.description:
A counter kept to avoid unnecessary array reads.
Note that `Sum(MissedBlocksBitArray)` always equals `MissedBlocksCounter`.

cosmos.slashing.v1beta1.ValidatorSigning.description:
ValidatorSigningInfo defines a validator's signing info for monitoring their
liveness activity.
